hiveArticle.title: A View from the Top - SkyDeck
hiveArticle.body:
It was a beautiful Sunday where I have spent the evening in the Top View Restaurant. It was a party organised by the Office in terms of Diwali. It was nice restaurant but the best thing was the view, it was outstanding, spectacular etc etc. 

I would not say it was on too much height, but being on 15th floor it was really cool. A nice wind were flowing which makes it a nice combination with food and drinks. 

Some of the photos :

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/pb4fwf0cnb.jpg)
